title: GAMEPLAY BUG ON KLED
body: Me and a friend where trying things out with kled{{champion:240}}  in a custom game. when suddenly i gained an extra skarl. when i dismounted it wouldnt go away and same for mounting. my friend has told me that he could see the extra skarl in the fog of war even when he didnt have vision on me. if it helps any thay were playing tahm kench{{champion:223}} .

replies.body:
Do you remember what you were doing right before you noticed the extra Skaarl? 
Was it a 1v1 game with Kled vs Tahm?

i do not remember what i was doing but it was a 1v1. we were testing wheter or not kleds beartrap on a rope would stay if tahm kench ate kled (it stays around). then we just ended up doing a 1v1. i tried recording and snapshotting the bug but my software for that wasnt working. i believe i had just recalled. i hope this helps
